vulnerabilities.title: thlorenz browserify-shim vulnerable to prototype pollution
vulnerabilities.description: Prototype pollution vulnerability in function `resolveShims` in resolve-shims.js in thlorenz browserify-shim 3.8.15 via the `k` variable in resolve-shims.js.

vulnerabilities.title: thlorenz browserify-shim vulnerable to prototype pollution
vulnerabilities.description: Prototype pollution vulnerability in function resolveShims in resolve-shims.js in thlorenz browserify-shim 3.8.15 via the fullPath variable in resolve-shims.js.

vulnerabilities.title: thlorenz browserify-shim vulnerable to prototype pollution
vulnerabilities.description: Prototype pollution vulnerability in function resolveShims in resolve-shims.js in thlorenz browserify-shim 3.8.15 via the shimPath variable in resolve-shims.js.
